Privacy Policy – Tirra

Effective Date: 20/08/2025

Tirra ("we," "our," or "us") operates the Tirra mobile app and www.tirra.love (the "Services"). This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your data under applicable Indian laws, including the Information Technology Act, 2000, and global best practices like GDPR.

1. Information We Collect

• Registration Data: Name, phone number, email, gender, date of birth, photos.
• Location Data: With your consent, to show nearby matches.
• Usage Data: Likes, chats, matches, preferences, interactions.
• Device Data: IP address, device type, operating system, cookies.
• Optional Data: Linked social accounts, profile details.

2. How We Use Data

• To create and manage your profile.
• To provide matchmaking and messaging.
• To improve app safety and detect fraud/spam.
• To personalize features and recommendations.
• To send updates, offers, and service notifications.

3. Data Sharing

• With Users: Limited profile details per your settings.
• With Service Providers: Hosting, analytics, payment processors.
• For Legal Reasons: To comply with Indian laws or safeguard users.

4. User Rights

• Access, correct, or delete your data via app settings.
• Withdraw consent for location/data usage.
• Request account deletion (data removed within 30–90 days).

5. Security

We use secure servers, encryption, and industry-standard safeguards. However, no system is 100% secure.

6. Eligibility

You must be 18+ years old to use Tirra.

7. Updates

We may update this policy. Updates will be posted with revised dates.

Terms & Conditions – Tirra

Effective Date: 20/08/2025

Welcome to Tirra ("App," "Service"). These Terms govern your use of our Services. By creating an account, you agree to them.

1. Eligibility

• You must be 18+ years old.
• You confirm your details are accurate and genuine.

2. User Conduct

You agree not to:
• Use Tirra for illegal, harmful, or offensive content.
• Harass, threaten, or scam other users.
• Impersonate others or misrepresent yourself.
• Use bots, scripts, or spamming techniques.

3. Content & Licensing

• You retain rights to content you upload but grant Tirra a license to display it within the app.
• Tirra may remove inappropriate or reported content.

4. Premium Features

• Subscription fees are disclosed in-app.
• Prices may vary by location.
• All payments are subject to Google/Apple billing terms or Tirra's payment gateway rules.

5. Safety Disclaimer

• Tirra does not conduct background checks on users.
• Users are solely responsible for interactions online or offline.
• Meet cautiously, preferably in public places.

6. Termination

• Tirra may suspend or ban accounts violating these Terms.
• Users may delete accounts anytime in settings.

7. Liability

Tirra provides the service "as is." Tirra is not liable for damages arising from user interactions.

8. Governing Law

These Terms are governed by Indian law, with jurisdiction in Kolhapur, Maharashtra.

Refund Policy – Tirra

Effective Date: 20/08/2025

At Tirra, we offer premium features (subscriptions, boosts, super likes). Please review our refund rules under RBI guidelines and app store policies.

1. General Policy

• All purchases are non-refundable, except as required by law.
• Subscriptions renew automatically unless cancelled before renewal.

2. Exceptions for Refunds

Refunds may be issued if:
• Duplicate or accidental charges occur.
• Payment processed but features not delivered.
• As required by Google Play Store or Apple App Store policies.

3. How to Request Refund

• If purchased via Google Play or Apple App Store, refunds must be requested directly from them.
• If purchased via Tirra website (UPI/Cards/Netbanking), contact support@tirra.app within 7 days of transaction.

4. Cancellation

• Users can cancel subscriptions in their app store settings anytime.
• Cancellation stops future renewals but does not refund past charges.
